name: Phoenix's Frantic Flight
description:
Guide Phoenix with the mouse through seven progressively more difficult levels in this on-rails side-scroller. Looking to stop the sudden swarm of black magic creatures at the source, Phoenix must dodge waves of enemies to reach the end of each level, and she can temporarily engulf herself in flames to protect herself.

This game uses the mouse for all gameplay except for some technical controls. You can pause with Escape, save with F5 and load with F6, and hold a number key when selecting a level you've already completed to start at the corresponding checkpoint.
